description.short: Advanced AI assistant for DTCE engineering knowledge
description.full: Intelligent AI assistant providing sophisticated search and analysis of DTCE engineering documents. Features include cost & timeline insights, best practices guidance, materials/methods comparisons, and internal expertise mapping. Search projects, reports, calculations, specifications, and more using natural language queries.

commands.title: help
commands.description: Show available commands and sophisticated query examples

commands.title: search [query]
commands.description: Search engineering documents with intelligent classification

commands.title: ask [question]
commands.description: Ask questions about projects, costs, timelines, or expertise

commands.title: cost insights
commands.description: Get cost and timeline insights: 'How long does concept to PS1 take?'

commands.title: best practices
commands.description: Find standards and templates: 'Standard approach for steel portal frames?'

commands.title: materials comparison
commands.description: Compare methods: 'When do we choose precast vs in-situ concrete?'

commands.title: expertise mapping
commands.description: Find internal knowledge: 'Which engineers have tilt-slab experience?'

commands.title: projects
commands.description: List and analyze engineering projects by type or scope
